sentences.en: Ethnology has been variously defined in different national traditions.
sentences.cn: 由于不同的民族传统,民族学有着各种不同的定义.

sentences.en: From the perspective of ethnology and the historical background, the five emperors had no blood relationship but emerged from the development and division of the clans and tribes.
sentences.cn: 从民族学的角度及当时的历史背景分析，五帝之间并非直系血缘的父子、子孙关系，而是氏族、部落发展过程中的分裂与分化。

sentences.en: Geographical aspect in linguistics, historical studies, ethnology, ecological studies.
sentences.cn: 语言学 、 史学 、 民族学 、 环境研究中的地理方面.经济地理.

sentences.en: Geography. Geographical aspect in linguistics, historical studies, ethnology, ecological studies. Economical geography.
sentences.cn: 地理. 语言学, 史学, 民族学, 环境研究中的地理方面. 经济地理.人口学.

sentences.en: In 2005 Ethnology of IES was endowed with the title of Provincial Elite Specialty.
sentences.cn: 2005年,民族学专业被认定为自治区精品专业.

sentences.en: It is a conclusion of deep importance in ethnology.
sentences.cn: 这个结论在人类学上是极端重要的.

sentences.en: It's of the great academic value of anthropology ethnology while it is also of strong readability.
sentences.cn: 本丛书既有深刻的人类学、族学的学术价值,同时又有极强的可读性.
收藏古生物学 、 质学 、 物学和人种学.

sentences.en: Pp .75 - 89 , Taipei: Institute of Ethnology, Academia Sinica.
sentences.cn: 台北: 喜马拉雅研究发展基金会.

sentences.en: Recently some anthropologist conducted an interesting case study in ethnology.
sentences.cn: 最近,一些人类学家开展了一项有趣的民族学案例研究.

sentences.en: The pattern of the Reindeer Industry in West Siberian of Russia is an important issue for ethnology.
sentences.cn: 西西伯利亚的养鹿业类型学研究是俄罗斯民族学的一个重要课题。

trans.tran_en: the scientific study and comparison of different races of people
